name: Dreamer's Strike
description: Where there lies fortune, so too must lie calamity.
effect: Devotees of the Phases of the Moon may call upon 'Dreamer's Strike' once per quest as a bonus action during their combat turn, allowing them to either inflict or cure the Drowsy status condition on their next attack. This status is incurable for 4 rounds. Alternatively, make your team immune to drowsy for 4 rounds.
